metadata.title: CVE-2023-27530 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A DoS vulnerability exists in Rack <v3.0.4.2, <v2.2.6.3, <v2.1.4.3 and<v2.0.9.3 within in the Multipart MIME parsing code in which could allow anattacker to craft requests that can be abuse to cause multipart parsing totake longer than expected.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
